import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CurrencyFormat from "react-currency-format"; import { useStateValue } from "./StateProvider"; import { getCartTotal } from "./reducer"; import "./Payment.css"; function Payment() { const [{ cart }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(""); const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState(""); const [delivaryAddress, setDelivaryAddress] = useState(""); const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [number, setNumber] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [info, setInfo] = useState(""); const [amount, setAmount] = useState(""); const [productName, setProductName] = useState([]); const [productId, setProductId] = useState([]); const sendOrder = (e) => {}; return (
